Tic-Tac-Toe Player Guide Welcome to the Tic-Tac-Toe guide!

Starting a Match

Hosting a game

Begin by clicking on the Host Game button in the top left of the screen.

  • You should see a 4-character code displayed next to the button.
  • Share this code with another player so they can join your match.

Joining a game

You will first need another player’s code to join their game.

  • Enter this code into the Access Code text box.
  • Click on Find Game to start the Tic-Tac-Toe match!

Basic Rules

  • Starting the Game: The Host moves first and plays as X, the other plays as O. Each players take turns placing their symbol in empty squares.
  • Objective: Line up three of your symbols in a row, column, or diagonal to win.
  • No Moves Left: When the board is full of symbols and neither party has won, the game ends in a tie.
  • Replay: When the game is finished, click on the Reset button to “leave” the match. Then you can host/join a new game.
